description:
WeMuslim is a user-friendly app with delicate and simple interfere and is the favorite of over 50 million Muslims. This app is the perfect companion for Muslims looking to stay on top of their religious obligations anytime, anywhere.

● Prayer times - Based on your current location, this app provides accurate prayer times and plays the magnificent audio of the Athan before each prayer.

● Quran Kareem - Supports audio recitations from various famous reciters and translations in nearly 10 languages and helps you do the Khatam Quran.

● Ummah - You can browse and post your thoughts on reciting the Quran, receive blessings from other Muslims, and raise your questions to be answered by the imam.

● Qibla - This feature provides an easy-to-use compass that points in the direction of the Kaaba.

● Hijri - This feature allows you to look up the Islamic calendar for future prayer times and also provides a function to record your daily prayers.

● Azkar - This feature includes Dua and remembrance based on Hadiths and the Quran, which can be easily read and recited.

● Tasbih - This feature includes an electronic tasbih and prayer beads counter to assist you in keeping count while reading your prayer or Dua.

● Hajj&Umrah - This feature provides the guide for the journey of Hajj, including the explanations and instructions for the ritual.

*Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details.

---------------------------------------------------------

If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at:
support@wemuslim.com

Learn more about WeMuslim at:
https://www.wemuslim.com
---------------------------------------------------------

تطبيق "الهيئة الوطنية للانتخابات" هو دليلك الشامل للمشاركة الفعالة في الانتخابات.
من خلال التطبيق، يمكنك:
1. التحقق مما إذا كان يحق لك التصويت.
2. معرفة موقع لجنتك الانتخابية بسهولة.
3. تصفح قوائم المرشحين والمرشحين الفرديين في منطقتك.
تم تطوير هذا التطبيق لتسهيل وصول المواطنين إلى المعلومات الانتخابية الموثوقة بدقة وسرعة.
شارك، صوتك هيوصل.

The best Athkar app / azkar (Daily Islamic Prayers) in Arabic & English languages. Free app with the option to subscribe to the exclusive version with extra features.

Accurate prayer times based on your current location

Qibla Direction

Roquia

Supports Apple Watch
Supports iPad

Friday sunnah reminder

Counter / Subha
Hajj and Umrah
Islamic greeting cards: Eid Mubarak - Ramadan Kareem.
Prayer times for the Apple Watch faces 
Create your own Athkar / Azkar and get notifications for any athkar you created. 
iCloud sync support

يمكنك نقل كل محتوى أذكاري اي جهاز ثاني أو ارساله إلى احد اقربائك أو اصدقائك.

اذا استخدمت نسخة من تطبيق أذكار في جهاز ثاني يمكنك مشاهدة نفس محتويات اذكاري والمفضلة والعداد.  
يمكنك استلام تنبيهات لكل قسم في أذكاري

---   النسخة الحصرية   ---

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Ayah is a modern, fully-featured Quran app that is beautiful and easy to use.

Ayah's clean, intuitive interface makes for a relaxing reading experience without any visual clutter. It's also fast to help you get back reading as quickly as possible.

With Ayah, you can listen to your favorite Quran recitations, with verse-by-verse highlighting and customizable repeat options.


FEATURES
• The latest edition of the Madinah Mushaf
• Tens of reciters to choose from
• Extensive sharing options
• Khatmah
• Colorful bookmarks
• Starred verses
• Quick searching
• Verse of the day
• Thematic highlighting
• Reminders
• Dark Mode



Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Azkar App is your daily companion for enhancing spirituality and facilitating Islamic practices. It provides a comprehensive collection of authentic Athkar (remembrances) and supplications from the Qur’an and Sunnah, along with innovative features designed to meet the needs of Muslims in their daily lives.

Join millions of users and experience a complete spiritual journey with Azkar App, crafted to serve every Muslim.

Key Features
- Morning & Evening Athkar, Sleep & Wake-up Athkar, Prayer Athkar, and more: A modern and user-friendly interface with an audio player and repetition counter.
- My Athkar Section: Create and customize your own Athkar according to your needs.
- Qur’an (Reading, Tafsir, and Audio): Enjoy an eye-friendly reading experience with font and color customization, translations in multiple languages, and easy-to-understand Tafsir. You can also listen or download recitations by your favorite reciter.
- Khatmah: Set a Qur’an completion plan with daily reading reminders.
- Prayer Times, Qibla Direction, and Hijri Calendar: View the Islamic calendar, accurate prayer times, and Qibla direction, with a monthly prayer calendar that can be shared.
- Adhan & Full Adhan Alerts: Choose from a variety of Adhan voices with pre-Adhan reminders.
- Reminders Section: Create reminders for specific Athkar, supplications, or important events with customizable sound and repetition options.
- Daily Content Updates: Get Dua of the Day, Ayah of the Day, and Video of the Day with valuable tips and inspiring stories.
- Various Azkar: A variety of supplications with customizable backgrounds, ready for sharing.
- Ramadan Section: Essential Ramadan features including Prayer & Fasting Tracker, Daily Duas, Zakat Calculator, and more.
- Daily Quranic Benefits: Daily insights into Qur’anic verses for contemplation.
- Worship Trackers: Tools to track Athkar, fasting, and prayers, helping you stay consistent and improve commitment.
- Tasbih Counter: Perform electronic Dhikr with an easy-to-use digital Tasbih.
- Ruqyah (Islamic Healing): Authentic Ruqyah texts from the Qur’an and Sunnah, with an audio listening option.
- Prophet Muhammad’s (PBUH) Biography in Videos: Engaging video content about the life of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH).
- 99 Names of Allah.
- Surah Al-Kahf Reminder for Fridays.
- Hajj & Umrah Guide: Step-by-step instructions for performing Hajj and Umrah.
- Islamic & Ramadan WhatsApp Stickers: Updated Islamic and Ramadan sticker packs with easy export to WhatsApp.
- Istighfar (Forgiveness) Alerts: Get reminders for seeking forgiveness and making Dhikr at customizable intervals (e.g., every 10 minutes or once a day).
- Qiyam-ul-Layl (Night Prayer) Alerts.
- Live Activities & Widgets: Quick access to features like prayer times, Hijri date, various azkar, Khatmah, prayer tracker, fasting tracker, and more from the home screen and lock screen.
- Professional & Customizable Design: Choose your favorite background, and enable dark mode for a better visual experience.
- …and many more great features you’ll love!

Why Azkar App?
Azkar App is a comprehensive Islamic tool, combining authenticity with modern technology to fulfill your spiritual and daily needs.

Take this opportunity to increase your daily rewards and strengthen your connection with Allah. Download Azkar App now and embark on an uninterrupted spiritual journey filled with Dhikr and supplication.


Privacy Policy:
https://hamzaaa.com/azkar/privacy.html

Terms of Use:
https://hamzaaa.com/azkar/terms-of-use.html
القران الكريم كاملا بدون انترنت بجودة عالية بصوت الشيخ ياسر الدوسري

developer: BEKART TECH BILISIM TEKNOLOJI INSAAT TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
description:
*** Offline Quran Reader Pro ***

Offline Quran Reader Pro is a unique Muslim source for listening and reading to the Mubarak (Holy) Quran in all your devices with many advanced abilities, such as:

- 12 different Quran translations
- Detailed Word Search in whole Qur'ân
- Following Qur'ân with Pronunciation and Meaning of Ayahs in 30 different languages (English, العربية, Français, Türkçe, Pусский, Español, Deutsch, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Melayu and 22 more...)
- Resumable (You can resume from the ayah that you have paused)
- Word by Word Quran details (also supported by word by word audio)
- Excellent and simple Audio Player (Best Reciter: Rashid Al Afasy)
- Detailed information about Surahs
- Reminding your preferred ayats with widgets
- Running perfectly without Internet

تطبيق أذكاري صُمم ليساعدك على ان لا تنسى ذكر الله ابداً!


تطبيق اذكاري صمم ليساعد على جعل الذكر عادة باذن الله

يمكنك الذكر اثناء تصفح الانترنت او اي برنامج تواصل اجتماعي مثل فيس بوك، تويتر، او اينستاغرام
يمكنك اظهار الأذكار اثناء المحادثة مع الاصدقاء على واتس اب، لاين، ڤايبر، فيس بوك، تانغو او اي تطبيق محادثة فقط بانزال مركز الاشعارات

خصائص و مميزات تطبيق الأذكار و الأدعية "أذكاري":

* أذكار الصباح, أذكار المساء أذكار النوم و غيرها من أذكار اليوم و اليلة
* تنبيه لأوقات أذكار الصباح, أذكار المساء, أذكار النوم
* رسائل اذكاري لتلقي اذكار و أدعية جديدة
* بوصلة القبلة, تعمل بدون انترنت
* صفحة بماذا تشعر؟ الاذكار مصنفة حسب الشعور
* المسبحة الاكترونية الذكية!
* ظهور الاذكار و الأدعية على مركز الاشعارات, ليساعدك ان لا تنسى ذكرك الله ابدا
* بامكانك اضافة اذكارك او ادعيتك الخاصة بك، لتظهر بشكل تلقائي على مركز الاشعارات
* استهلاك "أذكاري" للبطارية شيء لا يذكر. فقد تم تحسين ادائه و تجريبه ليقدم لك باحسن ادائه.
* يمكنك تصميم اشعار الذكر بنفسك فيمكنك تغيير لون خلفية اشعار الذكر, حجم و شكل خط الذكر..والمزيد..
* والمزيد من الميزات الرائعة التي تنتظرك لتكتشفها في برنامج أذكاري...

انشروه لينالكم الاجر


رابط شروط الاستخدام :

English:
"Athkari" Muslims's application, It has been designed to help you to never forget to mention Allah in the simplest way. Everything thing will be customizable in order to help you never forget to mention Allah on the way suitable for you.
 
While you are browsing Internet, news, chating or whatever you are doing on your mobile, Azkari will be able show the notification smoothly to remind you with Allah's name (Athkar) on your personally customized way..

Please share Azkari app as much as you can let Muslims share the Thawab..

Features of Azkari for Muslims:
* Morning Athkar, Evening Zikir, and Sleep Athkar
* Notification for Sabah Athkar, Evening Athkar, and Sleep Zikirs
* Qibla Compass, Works offline
* Athkar will be changed automatically, and periodically to remind you to mention Allah, just by draging the notification center down.
* You can add Athkar that you want it to show up in the notification
* Material Design is used to help you get what you want as fast as possible.
* FREE
* keep your Athkari up to date

Terms of Use:
https://athkariapp.com/terms-and-conditions.html

المصحف المرتل هو تطبيق لسماع القرآن الكريم بأصوات قراء ومشايخ الوطن العربي.

يتميز التطبيق في هذا الإصدار بإحتوائه على القرآن الكريم كاملاً ل 48 من أشهر قراء الوطن العربي والإسلامي.

تصميم بسيط متطور عالي الجودة يتيح لك التنقل بين أجزاء التطبيق بكل سهولة ويسر.

يمكنك أيضاً التحكم في كيفية الإستماع فيمكنك الاستماع لنفس السورة مراراً وتكراراً أو مرة واحدة فقط أو الإستماع لسور القرآن بالترتيب.

التطبيق يتضمن مدير محتوى بحيث يمكنك تحميل أو تشغيل أو حذف أية سورة لأي قارئ قد قمت بتحميلها من قبل وذلك لتوفير المساحة التخزينية لجهازك.

يمكنك أيضاً تحميل جميع السور لقارئ معين أو حذف جميع السور لأي قارئ بضغطة زر.

يمكنك تصفح وقراءة القرآن الكريم من المصحف المدمج مع إمكانية عمل زووم لسهولة القراءة.

يمكنك البحث عن السورة التي تريد الإستماع إليها مباشرة لسرعة الوصول.

إمكانية تشغيل السور أثناء القيام بمهام أخرى على الجهاز في الخلفية أو في حالة وإن كانت الشاشة مغلقة لتوفير الطاقة.

برجاء إستخدام خاصية الإتصال بنا من داخل التطبيق في حالة إن وددتم إضافة قارئ جديد للتطبيق أو أي تعليق آخر.

------------------------------------------------------------

The Recited Quran is an app for listening to the Holy Quran with the voices of reciters from around the world.

The application is distinguished in this version by containing the entire Holy Quran for 45 of the most famous reciters of the Arab and Islamic world.

A simple, advanced, high-quality design that allows you to navigate between parts of the application with ease and simplicity.

You can also control how to listen, so you can listen to the same Surah repeatedly or only once or listen to the Surahs of the Quran in order.

The application includes a content manager so that you can download, play or delete any Surah for any reciter that you have downloaded before in order to save storage space on your device.

You can also download all the Surahs for a specific reciter or delete all the Surahs for any reciter with the push of a button.

A search box for the quick access of the Surahs.

You can browse and read the Holy Quran from the built-in Quran viewer with the ability to zoom for ease of reading.

The ability to play the Surahs while performing other tasks on the device in the background or in the event that the screen is closed to save power.

Introducing our revolutionary translation app: Translate Rabbit；
Break the language barrier and communicate easily, let us be your best translation partner. Whether you are traveling, on international business, or want to communicate with people from different cultures, this app is your go-to solution.
With it, you can have a powerful translation tool anytime, anywhere. We try to ensure real-time, accurate translations so you can have smooth and in-depth conversations without the need for tedious language dictionaries or language learning. Say goodbye to the worries of difficult communication and embrace smooth understanding.
The main function:
1. Instant translation: Our app provides fast translation in multiple languages, allowing you to get what you need anytime, anywhere. Just type or speak your message and get translations quickly.
2. Voice recognition: Communicate easily by using voice input. Just speak into the device and seamless translation converts your words into the desired language.
3. Camera translation: Just point the camera at the text and you can instantly translate the text on the picture.
4. User-friendly interface: Our app provides a simple and intuitive interface, making it easy for anyone to use. Enjoy a seamless user experience from start to finish.
5. When relaxing, we have built-in word arrangement games, allowing you to learn languages through alphabet games in your spare time.
Don't let language differences stop you from connecting with others.

Welcome to the world of simplified crafting: YarnPal is the app that brings your knitting and crochet skills to life in no time. Simply snap a photo, follow step-by-step instructions, and create personalised projects—anytime, anywhere.

YarnPal is your daily companion for knitting and crochet, giving you easy access to tutorials, patterns, and design inspiration. Try it now with our free trial and unlock a world of stitches, motifs, and creative possibilities—perfect for both beginners and experienced makers!

What Can YarnPal Do?
1. Snap a Photo, Learn a Stitch
Seen a stitch you love? Take a photo, and YarnPal will tell you its name and show you how to do it. Picking up new stitches is quick and easy!
2. Step-by-Step Pattern Help
Stuck on a pattern? Upload it to YarnPal. The app will break it down for you and help you keep track of your place as you work through each row. You can even adjust the pace to suit your needs.
3. Creative AI Tools
Get Pattern Ideas: Lacking inspiration? Let YarnPal’s AI suggest new patterns for scarves, shawls, and other creative projects.
Fix Mistakes: Made an error? YarnPal can spot and help you fix it.
Understand Charts and Symbols: Struggling with pattern charts? YarnPal explains the symbols so you can follow along with confidence.
4. Ask the AI Coach
Have a question about knitting or crochet? Ask the AI Coach anything! From basic stitches to advanced techniques, get instant answers and helpful advice.
5. Personalise Your Projects
Want to make something unique? Adjust sizes, styles, and patterns to match your ideas. YarnPal helps you create truly one-of-a-kind pieces.

Who Is YarnPal For?
1. Beginners
New to knitting or crochet? YarnPal makes learning simple, with clear steps and helpful tips to get you started with confidence.
2. Hobbyists
Already enjoy knitting or crochet? Use YarnPal to try out new tools, tackle tricky patterns, and customise your projects. Take your craft to the next level!
3. Experts
Even for advanced crafters, YarnPal saves you time and sparks fresh ideas. Design better patterns, fix issues efficiently, and stay motivated.

Why Use YarnPal?
With YarnPal, crafting is:
Easy: Learn stitches and patterns stress-free.
Fun: Get creative and try something new.
Organised: Easily keep track of projects and progress.

Join the YarnPal Community
Connect with knitters and crocheters from around the world to share ideas, showcase your work, and get inspired. With YarnPal, you’ll never craft alone.

Start Your YarnPal Journey Today!
Download YarnPal now and see what you can create. Whether it’s your first simple scarf or an intricate piece of your own design, YarnPal will guide you every step of the way. Let’s make something amazing together!

Reverso is the best tool for those who seek quality translation, looking to master a foreign language: reading, writing or speaking, and it's free.

Students, teachers, business professionals or others, whether beginners or advanced, use Reverso to learn new words or expressions, and eliminate the risk of being mistaken.

It provides you instant translations of the selected text when reading content on your browser, on Safari or any other app.
 
Reverso Context is based on data gathered from millions of real-life texts (official documents, movie subtitles, product descriptions) in both languages. These texts are processed with powerful "big data" algorithms and machine learning to provide you the best results. 

What do we mean by context? The search results (translation) of a specific word or expression are weaved within real-life sentences, so you will be sure to understand and learn exactly how the word can be used, and make no embarrassing mistakes.  

Just type or say the word or expression you wish to translate and the results will appear instantly:  relevant translations, presented with examples of how words are used in sentences.

The app offers flashcards and quizzes based on your search history and favorites to help you memorize them and to improve your language skills. Unlike standard learning tools, it focuses on words and expressions that you really need and want to learn.

The bits and bytes: 
* Instantly translate selected text when reading content on your browser, iBook or any other app, with no need to exit the app you are using. Click on the familiar "Share" option and select the Reverso option. 
* Translation in 17 languages: Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, German, Polish, Dutch, Arabic, Russian, Romanian, Japanese, Turkish, Hebrew and Chinese, Korean, Swedish, Ukrainian and we are working on more.
* Advanced features include pronunciation, history, phrasebook of your favorites and more.
* Create vocabulary lists based on your personal selection of examples and translations. Lists remain available even when you’re offline. 
* Enjoy natural pronunciation of complete example sentences.
* One click to get translations, frequency details, and  conjugation when applicable.
* Search history, also available offline.
* Suggestions: words and expressions will be suggested to you as you type.
* Share your findings via email or social media.

Learn how to read the Bible to see, hear and know Jesus better. Access 100% free Bible videos, podcasts, blogs, classes, and educational Bible resources that help make the biblical story accessible.

HOME
	• Continue learning about the Bible by watching videos, listening to podcasts, and taking classes.
	• Any content you start will appear on Home so you can jump back in later. 

EXPLORE 
	• Hundreds of free videos, podcasts and classes allow you to meditate on scripture in your own way and at your own pace. 
	• It’s all free, there’s no paid subscription. 

VIDEOS
	• All of our videos are short visual explanations that show how the Bible is a unified story that leads to Jesus.
	• There’s a video (or two) that explain the structure, major themes and story in each book of the Bible

PODCASTS
	• BibleProject podcast features detailed conversations between Tim and Jon and occasional guests. 
	• Explore the biblical theology behind each book of the Bible and major themes found across the Bible.

CLASSES
	• Discover how to read and use the Bible to deepen your relationship with Jesus with a free class exploring the book of Genesis. 
	• Each lecture will sharpen your Bible study skills and make Scripture come alive. 
	• More classes are scheduled to be added over time. 

• • •

BibleProject is a nonprofit, crowdfunded organization that produces 100% free Bible videos, podcasts, blogs, classes, and educational Bible resources to help make the biblical story accessible to everyone everywhere.
From page one to the final word, we believe the Bible is a unified story that leads to Jesus. This diverse collection of ancient books overflows with wisdom for our modern world. As we let the biblical story speak for itself, we believe the message of Jesus will transform individuals and entire communities.

Many people have misunderstood the Bible as a collection of inspirational quotes or a divine instruction manual dropped from Heaven. Most of us gravitate toward sections we enjoy while avoiding parts that are confusing or even disturbing.

Our Bible resources help people experience the Bible in a way that is approachable, engaging, and transformative. We do this by showcasing the literary art of the Scriptures and tracing biblical themes from beginning to end. Rather than taking the stance of a specific tradition or denomination, we create materials to elevate the Bible for all people and draw our eyes to its unified message.
